name: Documentary Genre
description: Non-fiction factual content with authentic realism, observational style, and educational purpose

prompt.base: Documentary style, photorealistic, authentic environments, natural lighting, observational camera work, real-world settings, unposed subjects, journalistic approach, factual presentation
prompt.positive: photorealistic, natural lighting, authentic settings, real environments, candid moments, documentary photography, journalistic style, unfiltered reality, genuine expressions, environmental context, cultural authenticity, observational framing
prompt.negative: staged scenes, artificial lighting, fantasy elements, stylized effects, dramatic poses, fictional characters, theatrical lighting, unrealistic scenarios, CGI elements

technical.lighting: Available light, natural sources, minimal artificial lighting
technical.composition: Observational framing, handheld aesthetic, real-world perspectives

variations.name: Nature Documentary
variations.modifier: wildlife, natural habitats, environmental beauty, patient observation, ecological context

variations.name: Historical Documentary
variations.modifier: archival aesthetic, period accuracy, historical context, educational tone, factual reconstruction

variations.name: Social Documentary
variations.modifier: human stories, cultural context, social issues, intimate portraits, community focus

examples: An elderly craftsman working in their workshop, natural window light, authentic environment, candid moment captured, documentary realism
Wide shot of a bustling marketplace, natural lighting, diverse people in authentic activities, observational camera work
